name: MyVoc
tagline: a iciba-like dictionary application, integrated Collins dictionary API
body:
### Welcome to MyVoc.
This is a iciba-like dictionary application, integrated Collins dictionary API. 

![image](https://github.com/helenawang/MyVoc/blob/master/png/make_a_search.JPG)

### Functions
for each word you looked up, this program can:
* show the search result from `COBUILD Advanced British English Dictionary`
* add the word to notebook if you click the `add to notebook` button
* extract the definition and examples to a `word.txt` file
Next I will try to add some custom funtions in order to track behaviours and help you with your English learning~

### Appreciation
Thanks `Collins Learning` for providing API key and all the helpful documents.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with MyVoc? Check out our [documentation](https://github.com/helenawang/MyVoc) or [contact me](https://github.com/helenawang) and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
